content: Your point on the traveling can’t be overstated. The modern game has nearly eschewed traveling calls within thirty feet of the basket. I know because my wife and I are longtime WNBA season ticket holders, and the women’s game calls walks (at least they used to) much more rigorously than the men’s. So when I occasionally watch NBA games, I’m calling carry-overs, and five-steps-to-the-basket moves travels, but the officials are not.
